skills.education.body: St. Petersburg Technical College of Management and Commerce
about.body:
Hello, my name is Nikita! I have been developing backend servers for various applications for about 7 years. My experience includes building MVPs for small businesses from scratch, supporting complex enterprise systems, and restoring projects in critical condition.

I have enjoyed working in small to medium-sized teams, as well as managing projects independently or overseeing junior developers.

I value honesty and openness, enjoy helping my colleagues, and believe that a healthy work environment is essential. If you share these values, we will make a great team.

keyAchievements: Worked on many diverse projects (outsource company, see experiences below).
As additional responsibilities:
Worked on improvements to the hiring and employee grading process. Conducted employee grading and recruitment interviews.
Mentored and onboarded junior python developers. Acted as manager on internal employee onboarding projects.
Managed the internal python community. Facilitated meetings. Planned employee development events. Gave presentations.
Participated in the company's rapid response team. (see attachment)

experiences.position: Senior Python Developer (via Mad Devs LLC)
keyAchievements: Restored the project after a failed refactoring attempt by the previous customer team.
Rewrote the project to a microservice architecture to enable scaling the SaaS platform Kintsugi business to any number of clients.
Got the product to a production-ready state where Kintsugi started looking for customers.
Implemented 90% auto-test coverage of key product features for reliable product performance.
Implemented a set of SOPs to improve the efficiency of the development and testing teams.

At the request of the security specialist: performed HIPAA compliance project satisfaction testing. Validated the security of PII storage. Fixed security vulnerabilities based on bot reports (Vanta Agent, etc).
Prepared documentation of project architecture and functionality using Arch 42 template and C4 model.

experiences.position: Senior Python Developer (via Mad Devs LLC)
keyAchievements: Developed the backend for Swipey mobile app dealing with fund transfer of thousands of malaysian users
Planned sprints, mentored and guided a small team of Junior developers
Implemented robust money transfer automation through integration with partner services
Implemented 80% test coverage to ensure application reliability and user money security
Configured update automation and application health monitoring system for business continuity

experiences.position: Senior Python Developer (via Mad Devs LLC)
keyAchievements: Agrocloud: Within the month, implemented the MVP of a field irrigation level control panel for a client.
Bilim: Finalized the backend of the menstrual cycle mobile app. Implemented 100% test coverage. Automated updates.
Ex Parte: Moved obsolete API to Databricks. Improved algorithms for analyzing patent documents. Increased test coverage by 20%.
MadDevs: Worked on LMS solution for employees.
Worked on many diverse projects (outsource company, see experiences below).
Participated in company's internal python communities.
Implemented 70% of all server side work for a mobile application.
Released the product in production with 6000 users and daily revenue of ~1k usd / day.
Closed the scope of work for 2 other developers who had personal emergencies.
Integrated a partner lab that provides at-home testing services.
Integrated payment systems CloudPayments and Yandex.Kassa, subscription system, and currency conversion.
Implemented a basic algorithm for product recommendations based on nutrient information from analyses.
Implemented reports in Slack.
Implemented server (50%) with game logic and API for frontend.
Got the project into production, which was 2 months overdue at the start of work.
Closed the manager's responsibilities for communication with the client, drafting TOR and project life cycle.
Mentored a few new python developers.
Implemented over 30 parsers to aggregate event posters around the world.
Implemented orchestration of parsers.
Developed a web service for home delivery of groceries generating a shopping cart from past receipts.
Developed a telegram bot for home delivery service.
Developed a telegram bot to track weight.
Implemented a service for issuing discounted travel tickets and integration with the city's transport system.
